actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill exempting employees serving 60 days or less from the financial reporting requirements of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to exempt Federal employees who are not expected to perform the duties of office for more than 60 days a year from provisions which require new and terminated employees to file financial disclosure reports.

titles.title: A bill exempting employees serving 60 days or less from the financial reporting requirements of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978.
